body_html: Superficially, this looks like a 32/64 bit problem with bazel or java JDK installation. Could you please double check that you followed the instructions here https://bazel.build/versions/master/docs/install.html
body_text: Superficially, this looks like a 32/64 bit problem with bazel or java JDK installation.  Could you please double check that you followed the instructions here https://bazel.build/versions/master/docs/install.html
body: Superficially, this looks like a 32/64 bit problem with bazel or java JDK installation.  Could you please double check that you followed the instructions here https://bazel.build/versions/master/docs/install.html
